column2: "Afei iyinom ekyir no
column3: Persiahen Artasɛkeses n’ahendzi no mu no

column2: "Zerahia ba no
column3: Uzi ba no

column2: "Sii mu fi Babilɔn bae; eso nna ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛwfo a ɔawea Moses mbra no a EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: dze maa no no mu: na ɔhen no dze dza obisae nyinara maa no
column5: osiandɛ n’EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ne nsa wɔ no do."

column2: "Na Israelmba no mu bi
column3: nye asɔfo no
column5: nye adwontofo no nye mbobowano ahwɛfo no
column6: nye asɔrfi asomfo no mu binom baa Jerusalɛm wɔ ɔhen Artasɛkeses n’afe a otsia esuon no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa Jerusalɛm wɔ bosoom a otsia enum no a
column3: ɔyɛ ɔhen no n’afe a otsia esuon no ara mu."

column2: "Na bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a odzi kan no mu nna ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ orifi Babilɔn afow akɔ
column3: na bosoom a otsia enum no ne da a odzi kan no mu nna ɔbaa Jerusalɛm
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ne Nyankopɔn ne nsa pa a ɔwɔ no do no tse."

column2: "Osiandɛ nna Ezra esiesie n’akoma dɛ ɔbɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE ne mbra no
column3: na oedzi do
column4: na ɔaakyerɛkyerɛ ahyɛdze na atsɛmbusɛm wɔ Israel."

column2: "Afei nwoma a ɔhen Artasɛkeses dze maa ɔsɔfo Ezra
column3: ɔkyerɛwfo no

column2: "Artasɛkeses
column3: ahemfo hen no
column5: ɔsor Nyankopɔn ne mbra ho kyerɛwfo a odzi mu na adze."

column2: "Mara na mehyɛ mbra dɛ
column3: m’ahenman mu nyimpa biara a ofi Israel man mu
column4: na hɔn asɔfoe na Levifo no mu a hɔnankasa wɔpra hɔn yamu dɛ wɔbɔkɔ Jerusalɛm no

column2: "Susuampa dɛ wofi ɔhen na n’apamfo beesuon no enyim asoma wo dɛ kɔhwehwɛ Juda na Jerusalɛm mu dɛ mbrɛ wo Nyankopɔn mbra a ɔwɔ wo nsamu no tse;"
"na fa dwetɛ na sika a ɔhen na n’apamfo apra hɔn yamu dze ama Israel Nyankopɔn a ne tsenabew wɔ Jerusalɛm no
column4: "na dwetɛ na sika nyinara a ibenya no wɔ Babilɔn ɔmansin nyinara mu no
column5: ɔnye ayamuyi afɔrbɔdze a ɔman no
column7: praa hɔn yamu dze maa hɔn Nyankopɔn ne fi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no;"

column2: "dɛm ntsi bɔ mbɔdzen ara fa sika no totɔ anantwisaa
column3: nguannyin
column5: ɔnye hɔn ho edziban afɔr na hɔn nom afɔr
column6: na fa kɔbɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia a ɔwɔ hom Nyankopɔn ne fi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no mu no do."

column2: "Na adze biara a oye wɔ ɔwoara na wo nuanom no enyi do dɛ wɔdze dwetɛ na sika no ne nkaa no bɛyɛ no
column3: hom nyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ hom Nyankopɔn no pɛ."

column2: "Na ndzɛmba a wɔdze ama wo wɔ wo Nyankopɔn fi no som ho no
column3: yi no wɔ Jerusalɛm Nyankopɔn no enyim ma."

column2: "Na adze biara so a ohia ma wo Nyankopɔn fi a ohia dɛ edze bɛma no
column3: yi no wɔ ɔhen n’adzekorafi no mu ma."

column2: "Na emi
column3: mekyerɛ mara ɔhen Artasɛkeses
column4: mehyɛ mbra ma adzekorafo nyinara a wɔwɔ esuegya noho no dɛ
column6: ɔsor Nyankopɔn ne mbra kyerɛwfo no
column12: na wenyin galɔn ahaenum nye eduonum
column13: na ngo galɔn ahaenum nye eduonum

column2: "Adze biara a ɔsor Nyankopɔn ahyɛ no
column3: wɔmma wɔnyɛ no pɛr mma ɔsor Nyankopɔn ne fi no; na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebufuw bɔsoɛr wɔ ɔhen na ne mba ahenman no do?"

column2: "Eso yɛrema hom ehu dɛ
column3: asɔfo
column8: anaa Nyankopɔn ne fie asomfo no mu biara ɔmmfa kwan mu dɛ wɔgye hɔn tow

column2: "Na ɔwo
column3: Ezra
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wo Nyankopɔn ne nyansaa a ɔwɔ wo nsamu no tse
column5: na hyehyɛ nsɛndzifo na atsɛmbuafo a wobobu nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ esuegya noho nyinara atsɛn
column6: hɔn a wonyim wo Nyankopɔn ne mbra no nyinara; na hom nkyerɛkyerɛ nyia onnyim no so."

column2: "Na obiara a onnkedzi wo Nyankopɔn ne mbra
column3: na ɔhen ne mbra do no
column4: wombu no ho atsɛn mbɔdzembɔ do ara

column2: "Nhyira nka EWURADZE
column3: hɛn Nyankopɔn a ɔdze dɛm adze yi ahyɛ ɔhen n’akoma mu
column4: dɛ ɔdze rebɛyɛ EWURADZE ne fi a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no fɛɛfɛw;"

column2: "na ɔatrɛ mbɔbɔrhu mu aba no do wɔ ɔhen na n’apamfo
column3: na ɔhen ne mbapɔmba akatakyi no nyinara enyim. Na emi
column4: minyaa ahoɔdzen dɛ mbrɛ m’EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ne nsa a ɔwɔ mo do no tse
column5: na moboaboaa Israel mu nyimpa etsitsir no ano hyiae dɛ wɔnye me mfow nkɔ."
